metadata.title: Portfolio | Vinicius Cavalcanti Santos
metadata.description: My world of code in the spotlight! Explore my programming portfolio — a digital journey where ideas come to life through lines of code.

introduction.title: Hi, I'm Vinicius!
introduction.description: I developed this website using the Next.js framework. I'm a Full-Stack developer passionate about building modern web applications. Let’s connect and create something great together.

skills.title: Let me help you
skills.description: I have worked on various academic and freelance projects, gaining solid experience in multiple programming languages. As a Full-Stack developer specialized in PHP for back-end development, I continuously strive to improve my skills and deliver efficient, well-structured solutions.

projects.title: My projects
projects.port1: Responsive dashboard project developed for the ETE school.
projects.port2: Social network project created in 2023 using PHP and Next JS.
projects.port3: News website developed in 2021, featuring an interactive dashboard.
projects.port4: Part of the ETE development team in 2022.
projects.port5: Implemented a design created in Figma using Next.js.
projects.port6: Mobile version of the ETE control dashboard.

contact.title: Let me help you

As a Full-Stack developer specialized in PHP for back-end development, I continuously strive to improve my skills and deliver efficient, well-structured solutions.
